Title: Miles Davis releases Bitches Brew
Description: Fuses jazz with rock, launching jazz fusion movement.

Title: Miles Davis releases Jack Johnson
Description: A raw electric jazz-rock album reflecting the boxing champion’s energy.

Title: Herbie Hancock releases Mwandishi
Description: Marked by experimental fusion and electronic textures.

Title: Miles Davis releases On the Corner
Description: A dense, groove-heavy album blending funk, jazz, and rock.

Title: Weather Report releases I Sing the Body Electric
Description: Blends fusion with more accessible grooves.

Title: Return to Forever forms
Description: Chick Corea’s band becomes a major force in jazz fusion.

Title: Keith Jarrett records The Köln Concert
Description: One of the best-selling solo piano albums in jazz history.

Title: Weather Report releases Tale Spinnin’
Description: Known for its complex compositions and dynamic performances.

Title: Return to Forever releases Romantic Warrior
Description: A landmark fusion album featuring virtuosic playing.

Title: Jean-Luc Ponty pioneers jazz violin fusion
Description: Releases Enigmatic Ocean blending jazz, rock, and classical.

Title: Pat Metheny forms Pat Metheny Group
Description: A new fusion band mixing jazz with folk and rock influences.

Title: Herbie Hancock releases Sunlight
Description: Incorporates funk and synthesizers, continuing fusion innovations.
